definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
Ishihara Jintarō (1932-), Japanese author and politician, governor of Tokyo since 1999
to preserve a proper behavior in private life
Xu Shen (-147) the compiler of the original Han dynasty dictionary Shuowen Jiezi 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
to pay careful attention to one's parents' funerary rites
ancient ethnic group of northeast frontier of China
to treat a matter with due consideration (idiom)
One careless move and the whole game is lost. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1

definition: to take caution as the key (idiom); to proceed very carefully

sentences.english: But emesis is prohibited for pregnant women and must be applied cautiously to the weak.
sentences.chinese: 但是吐法禁用於妊娠婦女，慎用於體弱者。

sentences.english: In Chapter Three, Huang Shen's individual nature of his calligraphy feature in painting is analysed by means of contrast and comparison.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分對比分析了黃慎人物畫的書寫性的個性特徵。

sentences.english: In the history of Chinese art, Huang Shen, a highly successful calligraphers and painters.
sentences.chinese: 在中國美術史上，黃慎是一位卓有成就的書畫家。

sentences.english: Let us not forget that the Japanese are an intransigent people.
sentences.chinese: 吾人慎勿忘日本乃一頑強之民族。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to take advantage/to seize an opportunity/in passing/without taking extra trouble/conveniently
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
